entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or snow near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
